flawed_nl_solution:
The time it took Manu to complete the race is 60 + 12 = <<60+12=72>>72 seconds
If Amy is twice as fast as Manu, then she takes half the time Manu did to finish the race, so Amy took 1/2 * 72 = 63 seconds.
#### 63

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 63. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
